     <span class="search-link-icon">

       <path class="icon-search" d="M13 11.67L9.06 7.73A4.84 4.84 0 0 0 10 5a5 5 0 0 0-5-5 5 5 0 0 0-5 5 5 5 0 0 0 5 5 4.88 4.88 0 0 0 2.72-.94L11.67 13zM2 5a3 3 0 1 1 3 3 3 3 0 0 1-3-3z">
       </path>
      </svg>
     </span>
    </a>

       <div class="form-group">

       </div>

     <div class="account-snippet">

        </div>
        <div class="username">
        </div>
       </div>

        LOGIN
       </a>
       <span class="hide-logged-in">
        Don't have a Native account?
        <a href="/en/login/" id="account-signup-link">
         Sign up now
        </a>
       </span>
      </div>

        </a>

     <div class="trailer-div trailer_6247">
      <div id="teaserVideo">
       <div class="incontent-video" data-no-interaction="true" data-poster-from-child="true" data-video-autoplay="true" data-video-ratio="1400/3840" data-video-src="//cdn.flowplayer.com/a13328bc-2cd6-44f6-8a1e-a177b61dc454/hls/d20e80af-7993-4867-862a-27cc7a5819bc/playlist_1080.m3u8">

       </div>
       <span class="hero-link__text top-center mobile-top">

         FREE TREATS WITH KOMPLETE 13

           .product-category-list {
      display: block;
      margin: 17px 2.4409836066% 0 2.4409836066% !important;
    }
    .product-category-list--item {
      display: block;
      background-color: #fff;
      margin-bottom: 2px;
      padding: 14px 15px;
      color: #333;
      text-decoration: none;
      position: relative;
    }
    .product-category-list--item:hover {
      color: #3e8cbb;
    }
    .product-category-list--item:last-child {
      margin-bottom: 0px;
    }
    .product-category-list--item--head {
      font-size: 19px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      font-family: "TradeGothicLTCom-BdCn20", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
      font-weight: normal;
      line-height: 1em;
      display: block;
      margin-bottom: 7px;
    }
    .product-category-list--item--subhead {
      font-size: 15px;
      line-height: 1em;
      opacity: 0.7;
    }
    .product-category-list--item img {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      right: 5px;
      width: 22px;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      opacity: 0.3;
    }
    @media only screen and (min-width: 767px) {
      .product-category-list {
        display: none;
      }
    }
